About

Hello. My name is Agapitus Keyka Vigiliant, currently studying as a mathematics student at ITB. In my studies, I like computational topics (such as Numerical Mathematics, Simulation and Mathematical Computation, as well as Linear Algebra and Introduction to Optimization). In my free time, I like to spend time listening to music, reading management books, or just relaxing. But if I get bored, I often make projects to satisfy curiosity, [sometimes] as well as proof of concept to my friends that nothing is impossible.

In the future, I hope to learn more things, and be able to work together to make something useful for others.

Projects

Digilib Downloader

One of the programs in the Research Division of HIMATIKA ITB is the 'Lex Luthor Database'. Simply put, this program wants to make an integrated database about the organization. With this database, it is expected that oganization can implement data-based policies with ease. When assigned to do extend this database, I decided to create a list of alumni's theses by scrapping campus library.

GitHub

Lecture Notes

This is a project(s) to create lecture notes on some math courses I followed.

GitHub

Private SMS Gateway

Some places in Indonesia currently do not have internet access, there are still many who rely on SMS and telephone to communicate. This project is my effort to continue being able to send and receive e-mails, access social media - such as LINE and Whatsapps - Wikipedia, KBBI, WolframAlpha, etc., using SMS via classic mobile phones such as Nokia.

GitHub
